title: The Bear
occurrences: The bear.... What do you call him? Martin.
Buy him? What, are we selling the bear now? To whom?
The bear has been ill for months.
to have a bear trophy.
We've stooped to selling the bear now?
- Nobody is shooting the bear. - We're not gypsies, to sell our bear!
People, this bear is dying. What the fuck!
You want to sell my bear, the one I went to Moscow and Monte Carlo with?
We won't sell our bear.
We won't sell our bear! We won't sell our bear!
I'm not interested in your problems here. I need the bear.
We should vote, it's out bear.
He needs their votes to shoot our bear.
I fed that bear, too. ,
I don't know how you're going to do it, but I need the bear tomorrow.
See, Aurel? The bear , will stay at our circus.
Because the bear broke that box where you'd put Cici
No to selling the bear.
"Yes" for selling the bear, "no" for not selling. That's what I understood.
I voted for the bear to stay at the circus.
No! I don't want them to sell the bear.
Anyhow, the bear is not going anywhere.
Didn't you promise me that you'd give me the bear if I came back to you?
People, I think you don't understand. On paper, the bear is mine. Get it?
When I took over this circus, I took the bear and the lion and...
- The bear belongs to Cici and that's it. - The bear belongs to me.
The bear belongs to the circus. And I am the circus manager.
What bear will you buy? A teddy bear? Juggler.
The bear is dying and you're arguing.
Just to save that stupid bear that I haven't even seen.
And now, nobody wants money anymore. They all want the bear.
The only living bear he's ever seen was in a photo.
We need the bear.
The bear is not a problem. What the hell? I am the manager, I'm in charge.
Just now you were telling me to get the bear, that the German is coming...
Now you have the bear and you're hesitating?
Do you know where they moved the bear?
Have you seen the Bachelor? The bear cage is gone and I need to feed him.
- What do you mean, it's gone? - The bear cage. It disappeared.
Aurel! Aurel! They stole the bear!
They stole the bear. I can't believe it...
- I told you it's not there. No cage, no bear. - This is impossible!
- What happened? - They stole the bear.
Don't tell me the bear is gone...
- I can't believe that he stole the bear. - And you mean you don't know anything?
If he took the bear and the cage he needed the crane.
He was here with the cab at 6. He took the bear...
He can't run with the bear on his back.
The bear... When can I shoot it? The bear. Bang bang.
- How do you say bear in German? - I don't understand anything
Have you seen a car with a beautiful bear and a couple of bastards in it?
So that was a bear when you came out!
Aren't you sorry for the bear?
Have you seen the bear?
Man, the bear escaped. Don'tjust stand there!
I am the deputy manager since Panduru ran away with the bear.
I'm not leaving Bachelor alone. I care about the bear.
So Shorty is the only one who cares about the bear?
I don't care about the bear? Didn't I make my car available?
And I could have really used the money for the bear.
We'll fight after we save the bear!
We agreed the tamer would be here too, not that we steal the bear.
Ifyou stole the bear, I'm going straight to the police.
Not the car, not the bear, ,, not... what the fuck...
If you're afraid of a poor circus bear...
This bear is half dead. He only eats bread and honey.
But I have never loved anybody more than I love this bear.
When I see her, I remember the bear.
Come on up. We need to shoot the bear. Up, up. Oh, brother.
The car broke down, we didn't get the money for the bear....
Have you seen a bear with a chain around his neck?
Bear? This guy is pulling my leg.
- What bear, gipsy? - My bear.
It's not your bear, it's mine.
- Wait. What bear are you talking about? - The bear I dance with at weddings.
A male bear?
You know why your bear ran away?
He smelled my bear. She's a female.

I'm going to find my bear.
I saw you around the bear cage... talking to that loser.
I struggle. I get under the car to save the bear and this one here calls me a thief.
- We have a bear to shoot. - Ja, ja..
Platellini, I'm going back home. Fuck the bear.
What if they shot the bear and we're running around like idiots?
Yeah. What if they shot the bear and took the Fritz's money?
The bear belonged to the circus.
The money for the bear belongs to the circus, too.
I won't take no money if they killed the bear.
What if he goes to the police and tells them we stole the bear?
Let's go where the bear men said.
I'm not going anywhere. Fuck the bear.
I'm taking the Fritz to break the bear's back and I'm coming back for sarmale.

...and I shot the bear...
They shot my bear.
They shot my bear!

And the bear...
I want to see Panduru's face when we find the bear.
And I shoot the bear...
You go up there and bang-bang the bear. OK?
Hold the bear!
He's not used to it, he's a circus bear.
This bear is going nowhere, get it?
I saved him, it's the bear of the circus. , I'm the circus, so it's my bear.
...your bear left.
I will come next year, we'll shoot another bear.
